sourcesContent:
<template>
  <span v-bind="$attrs" :style="computedStyle" />
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { computed, defineComponent } from 'vue'

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'ElVisuallyHidden',
  props: {
    style: {
      type: [String, Object, Array],
    },
  },
  setup(props) {
    return {
      computedStyle: computed(() => {
        return [
          props.style,
          {
            position: 'absolute',
            border: 0,
            width: 1,
            height: 1,
            padding: 0,
            margin: -1,
            overflow: 'hidden',
            clip: 'rect(0, 0, 0, 0)',
            whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
            wordWrap: 'normal',
          },
        ] as any
      }),
    }
  },
})
</script>
